effects: Restore 200 (+4x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies
Increase resistance to all status effects by 25% for all allies for 3 turns
name: Preservation
Preservation
維護
점검
Préservation
Erhaltung
Preservación
desc_short: Gradually restore HP and boost poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies
持續恢復全體隊員的HP+提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值
아군 전체의 HP 서서히 회복+독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Restaure progressivement les PV et aug. la rés. à poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri. pour tous les alliés
Stellt allmählich LP wieder her und erhöht Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Recupera VIT poco a poco y aumenta la res. a ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de todos los aliados
desc_long: Gradually restores HP and boosts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies.
持續恢復全體隊員的HP，並提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值。
아군 전체의 HP가 서서히 회복하고, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Restaure progressivement les PV et aug. la rés. à poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri. pour tous les alliés
Stellt allmählich LP wieder her und erhöht Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Recupera VIT poco a poco y aumenta la resistencia a veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confunsión, enfermedad y piedra de todos los aliados.
